summary: A Thriller set in 1932 about two nurses trapped in a country mansion with their invalid patient whilst a killer is on the loose. A series of unexplainable events start to occur and the nurses begin to wonder if they are no longer alone.
cast: Tania Nolan|Rosella Hart|Kevin Keys|Sylvia Rands|Gerald Bryan|Alex Galvin|Richard Nichol|Mike Bodnar|Arkwright|Carla Feakin|Kate Lineham|Denise Menara
title: When Night Falls
